Hi guys
I installed junit3.7 on c: drive and set classpath correctly

Problem1:(Why classpath I set first time didnot work?)
(I added classpath c:\Junit3.7\junit.jar)
I gave 
c:\jUnit3.7> java junit.textui.TestRunner junit.samples.AllTests
This didnot recognise the classpath.
so I gave c:\jnit3.7\set classpath=%classpath%;c:\junit3.7\junit.jar

Then I repeated
c:\jUnit3.7> java junit.textui.TestRunner junit.samples.AllTests
Classpath worked ok this time.

Problem2:
It gave the following results
tests90 failed:0 errors:1

testclassloading(junit.tests.TestCaseClassLoaderTest)had an error.
java.lang.ClassNotFound Exception:junit.tests.ClassLOaderTest

I read something about util.properties file to be changed etc as the 
classloader with Junit doesnot reload jdk classes.Why did Junit have 
to be so complicated to install and work straight away.But its not 
clear to me how I can fix this problem and get Junit to work without 
error.

So please advise me.
regards
Rao
subject: Class Not Found
